Content: Consumer services authority has nod to five brand names to escalate price of 50 Kg packs of cement from 60 rupees. The new prices that came to effect from yesterday lay at 930 rupees. A pack of 50 Kg cement was previously priced at 870 rupees. The relevant cement companies had made request to the consumer services authority to increase their prices due to the shrink of Sri Lankan rupee and bulking of value added tax (VAT).
